name: kannuu
overview:
kannuu provides new technologies that enable fast and convenient content discovery on any device without the need of a keypad or keyboard.

â€œkannuuâ€™s patented Partial Word Completion technology scans a database to instantly present the four word or phrase sections that are statistically most likely to start the word or phrase that is being searched. The user selects the correct option, or presses the centre button to bring up the next four characters or phrase sections. Each selection prompts the delivery of the next four most likely word or phrase sections, building up partial words, and eventually presenting the only possible final outcome.â€

kannuuâ€™s Partial Word Completion enables users to create complex search phrases accurately in just few clicks. kannuu offers a simple and customizable user interface which increases device usability and customer satisfaction in any mobile device.

kannuu received the prestigious Technology Innovation Award for Best Mobile Multimedia experience at Nokia’s Mobile Rules ‘08.

Source: kannuu
